page.title: 06ABERWHEELER SPORTS
page.content: A very popular event in the village calendar are the Aberwheeler Sports which are held on the playing fields in the Waen.They are usually held on the last Saturday of the school summer term or the first Saturday of the holiday. The competitions are confined to persons residing in the parishes of Aberwheeler and Bodfari and the pupils attending Ysgol Bodfari. There are four main sections of competition_ children's sports,senior sports, five a side football and a fancy dress competition.Prize money is available for the children and the "Massey Perpetual Trophy" to the winners of the five a side football. During the afternoon refreshments are available to quench the thirst of competitors.
